Articles.Content:
Today I landed on the mun for the very first time with jeb kerman's brain! It was hard and I had to restart a lot of times but I finally made it alive!

I have some pictures to post but I don't know how to post the pictures and put them in a spoiler so help would be nice.

Edited October 13, 2012 by 619Soldier
use a site like imgur to post the pictures
whats with your mun? looks weird, anyway, gratz
Congratulations on your first Mun landing. Isn't it an amazing feeling of accomplishment? (Your Mun has hardwood floors? Classy!)
He most likely has most of the graphics settings at their bare minimums.

Which isn't a terrible thing.

My first mun landing had me biting my nails when one of the landing legs snapped off upon contact. Fortunately I went with the 4 leg approach which helped me maintain an upright attitude by some miracle. Unfortunately I wasn't able to return my crew home as I overdid it on the TKI burn. I did manage a nice parking orbit however with some patience and a lot of RCS juice. This was just before 0.14 came out along with persistence, otherwise it would have been a fun challenge to scoop them up in another craft to bring them back.

If you do have any other shots of your lander, please share them, too. I do have to say the second pic showing Jeb in silhouette feeling absent from Kerbin does give me the chills. Maybe he forgot his kerby bear?

Well Done, I just achieved my first safe Mun landing yesterday (without anything breaking).

Keep on going and you will be heading to Duna and Eve.

Good job 619soldier,

I sort of landed on the Mun too. By sort of I mean I ran out of fuel, detached landing gear with lander secondaries, and blew up the lower half of the ship upon landing. But the good news is Jebidia survived and I am currently working on a rescue craft.

I just attempted to send a 3-man pod to the mun as a rescue mission but it always just blew up or I was too far away from the Mun One command module to pick jeb up. So I guess he is stuck there...

Oh well!
